entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @Mike_Pence Way to go!  Can you run out to the closest Covid19 ward in DC, shake hands with all patients. Pick your nose, rub your eyes. Then go share cookies snd milk with nursing home residents and prove we can safely reopen to shut these naysayers down sir?  Please. Show how great you are
